level.heading: DECISION OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE REVIEW PANEL (§ 29-226)

level.text: The Administrative Review Panel shall render a written decision which sets forth its evaluation and resolution of the complaint and describes the actions required of the Administration, as well as those required of the licensee, in implementing the decision.
The Administrative Review Panel shall issue a written decision within fifteen (15) working days after its review of a complaint.

Each written decision of the Administrative Review Panel shall notify the licensee of the licensee’s right to request a full evidentiary hearing within fifteen (15) working days after the issuance of the Administrative Review Panel’s decision.
